alert.note: Alert for Chuckwalla Mountains; Chuckwalla Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:35PM PDT by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Riverside County through 515 PM PDT... At 434 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Desert Center, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Desert Center. This includes the following highways... CA Interstate 10 between mile markers 104 and 128. CA Route 177 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
